item.description:
A friend of mine recommended an Ethiopian restaurant recently, so I thought it would be fun to try. Fasika Ethiopian Restaurant is known to have very authentic Ethiopian food and I've heard its delicious. Apparently, the Ethiopian Running Team goes here after the Boston Marathon.

The menu at Fasika includes highly seasoned stews and fried meats, served atop an edible platter of injera (a spongy, pancake-like flatbread). Diners sit on tiny stools around intricately woven basket tables. There is a large selection of vegetarian dishes, and Honey wine and cardamom-flavored coffee are among the drink options.

Her is a link to the menu: http://www.fasikarest...

Disclaimer: I chose this restaurant instead of another more popular Ethiopian restaurant because this restaurant can handle a larger reservation. However, even though the food is very good, Fasika is known to have little atmosphere and shares the restaurant with a bar that get very noisy. However, the food makes up for the lack of atmosphere and noise. The restaurant also only takes cash, but there is an ATM machine.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting out front of the restaurant. Look for the Meet Up sign.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Fasika Ethiopian Restaurant
